spells.name: Arcane Gate
spells.description: You create linked teleportation portals that remain open for the duration. Choose two points on the ground within range, one within 10 feet of you. A 10-foot-diameter circular portal opens over each point. A creature that enters one portal exits from the other portal.

spells.name: Blade Barrier
spells.description: You create a vertical wall of whirling, razor-sharp blades made of magical energy. The wall appears within range and lasts for the duration. The wall can be up to 100 feet long, 20 feet high, and 5 feet thick. A creature takes 6d10 Slashing damage when it enters the wall's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Bones of the Earth
spells.description: You cause up to six pillars of stone to burst from places on the ground within range. Each pillar is a Cylinder that has a diameter of 5 feet and a height of up to 30 feet. A creature standing on a pillar is pushed up with it. If a creature is crushed against the ceiling, it takes 6d6 Bludgeoning damage.
spells.at_higher_levels: You can create two additional pillars for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.material: three silver pins
spells.description: You create a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of your choice that you can see within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 10d8 Lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
spells.at_higher_levels: One additional bolt leaps to another target for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Circle of Death
spells.material: powder from a crushed black pearl worth 500+ GP
spells.description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out in a 60-foot-radius Sphere from a point within range. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d8 Necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 2d8 for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Conjure Fey
spells.description: You conjure a Medium spirit from the Feywild. The spirit lasts for the spell's duration. When it appears, make a melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet of the spirit. On a hit, the target takes 3d12 + your spellcasting modifier Psychic damage and has the Frightened condition for the spell's duration. On each of your turns, you can use a Bonus Action to teleport the spirit up to 30 feet and repeat the attack.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 2d12 for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Contingency
spells.material: a gem-encrusted statuette of yourself worth 1,500+ GP
spells.description: Choose a spell of level 5 or lower that you can cast, that has a casting time of an action, and that can target you. You cast that spell—called the contingent spell—as part of casting Contingency, but the contingent spell doesn't come into effect. Instead, it takes effect when a certain circumstance occurs.

spells.name: Create Homunculus
spells.material: clay, ash, and mandrake root, plus a jewel-encrusted dagger worth 1,000+ GP
spells.description: While speaking an intricate incantation, you cut yourself with the dagger, taking 2d4 Piercing damage. You then drip your blood on the other components and touch them, transforming them into a Homunculus. The Homunculus is a construct that obeys your commands without hesitation.

spells.name: Create Undead
spells.material: one 150+ GP black onyx stone for each corpse
spells.description: You can cast this spell only at night. Choose up to three corpses of Medium or Small Humanoids within range. Each corpse becomes a Ghoul under your control. You can issue mental commands to your creatures. On your turn, you can mentally command any creature you made with this spell if it is within 120 feet of you.
spells.at_higher_levels: 7th: 4 Ghouls or 2 Ghasts/Wights. 8th: 5 Ghouls, 3 Ghasts/Wights, or 2 Mummies. 9th: 6 Ghouls, 4 Ghasts/Wights, 3 Mummies, or 2 Mummy Lords.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.material: a lodestone and a pinch of dust
spells.description: A thin green ray springs from your pointing finger to a target you can see within range. The target can be a creature, an object, or a creation of magical force. A creature targeted by this spell must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 10d6 + 40 Force damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, it is disintegrated. A disintegrated creature is reduced to a pile of fine gray dust.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 3d6 for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Drawmij's Instant Summons
spells.material: a sapphire worth 1,000+ GP
spells.description: You touch an object weighing 10 pounds or less whose longest dimension is 6 feet or less. The spell leaves an invisible mark on its surface and invisibly inscribes the name of the item on the sapphire. At any time, you can use the sapphire to summon the item to your hand.

spells.name: Eyebite
spells.description: For the duration, your eyes become an inky void imbued with dread power. One creature of your choice within 60 feet must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by one of the following effects of your choice: Asleep (Unconscious until damaged or action to wake), Panicked (Frightened), Sickened (Poisoned). You can affect a new creature as a Magic action until the spell ends.

spells.name: Find the Path
spells.material: a set of divination tools worth 100+ GP
spells.description: You magically know the shortest, most direct physical route to a specific fixed location with which you are familiar on the same plane of existence. For the duration, as long as you are on the same plane, you know how far it is and in what direction it lies.

spells.name: Flesh to Stone
spells.material: powite and powite each of which the spell consumes
spells.description: You attempt to turn one creature you can see within range into stone. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it has the Restrained condition for the duration. On each of its turns while Restrained, the target must repeat the save. Three successful saves end the spell. Three failures mean it is Petrified for the duration.

spells.name: Forbiddance
spells.material: ruby dust worth 1,000+ GP
spells.description: You create a ward against magical travel that protects up to 40,000 square feet of floor space. Creatures can't teleport into the area or use portals to enter it. The spell damages one or more types of creatures you choose: Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead. A creature takes 5d10 Radiant or Necrotic damage when it enters the area.

spells.name: Globe of Invulnerability
spells.material: a glass bead
spells.description: An immobile, faintly shimmering barrier springs into existence in a 10-foot Emanation around you and remains for the duration. Any spell of level 5 or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or objects within it.

spells.name: Guards and Wards
spells.material: a silver rod worth 10+ GP
spells.description: You create a ward that protects up to 2,500 square feet of floor space. You can create the following effects within the warded area: Corridors (fog, magic mouths), Doors (locked), Stairs (webs), Other (Dancing Lights, Gust of Wind, Stinking Cloud, or Suggestion).

spells.name: Harm
spells.description: You unleash a virulent disease on a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 14d6 Necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. The damage can't reduce the target's Hit Points below 1.

spells.name: Heal
spells.description: Choose a creature you can see within range. Positive energy washes through the creature, restoring 70 Hit Points. This spell also ends the Blinded, Deafened, and Poisoned conditions on the target.
spells.at_higher_levels: The healing increases by 10 for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Heroes' Feast
spells.material: a gem-encrusted bowl worth 1,000+ GP, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You conjure a feast that takes 1 hour to consume. Up to twelve creatures can partake. A creature that consumes the feast gains several benefits: it is cured of all diseases and poisons, has Immunity to Poison and the Frightened condition, gains Advantage on Wisdom saving throws, and gains 2d10 Temporary Hit Points. These benefits last for 24 hours.

spells.name: Investiture of Flame
spells.description: Flames race across your body, shedding Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. You have Immunity to Fire damage and Resistance to Cold damage. Any creature that moves within 5 feet of you takes 1d10 Fire damage. You can use a Magic action to create a 15-foot Cone of fire. Each creature in the Cone must make a Dexterity save, taking 4d8 Fire damage on a failed save.

spells.name: Investiture of Ice
spells.description: Ice spreads across your body, and you have Immunity to Cold damage and Resistance to Fire damage. Ground within 10 feet of you is icy Difficult Terrain. You can use a Magic action to create a 15-foot Cone of freezing wind. Each creature in the Cone must make a Constitution save, taking 4d6 Cold damage on a failed save and having its Speed reduced to 0 until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Investiture of Stone
spells.description: Your body takes on stone-like appearance. You have Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage. You can move across Difficult Terrain made of earth or stone without spending extra movement. You can move through solid earth or stone as if it were Difficult Terrain. If you end your turn inside stone, you are ejected and take 5d6 Bludgeoning damage.

spells.name: Investiture of Wind
spells.description: Wind swirls around you. Ranged weapon attacks made against you have Disadvantage. You gain a Fly Speed of 60 feet. You can use a Magic action to create a 15-foot Cube of swirling wind centered on a point you can see within 60 feet. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution save, taking 2d10 Bludgeoning damage on a failed save.

spells.name: Magic Jar
spells.material: a gem, crystal, or reliquary worth 500+ GP
spells.description: Your body falls into a catatonic state as your soul leaves it and enters the container. While your soul inhabits the container, you can possess other creatures' bodies. You can return to the container or your body at will.

spells.name: Mass Suggestion
spells.material: a snake's tongue
spells.description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence up to twelve creatures of your choice within range that can hear and understand you. Creatures that can't be Charmed are immune. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target pursues the suggested course of action to the best of its ability.
spells.at_higher_levels: 7th: 10 days. 8th: 30 days. 9th: 1 year and a day.

spells.name: Mental Prison
spells.description: You attempt to bind a creature within an illusory cell that only it perceives. One creature you can see within range must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 5d10 Psychic damage and perceives a harmful barrier surrounding it. If the target is moved outside this illusory barrier or touches it, the target takes 10d10 Psychic damage and the spell ends.

spells.name: Move Earth
spells.material: a miniature shovel
spells.description: Choose an area of terrain no larger than 40 feet on a side within range. You can reshape dirt, sand, or clay in the area in any manner you choose for the duration. You can raise or lower the area's elevation, create or fill in a trench, erect or flatten a wall, or form a pillar.

spells.name: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
spells.material: a crystal sphere
spells.description: A frigid globe of cold energy streaks from your fingertips to a point of your choice within range, where it explodes in a 60-foot-radius Sphere. Each creature within the area must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 10d6 Cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Otto's Irresistible Dance
spells.description: Choose one creature you can see within range. The target begins a comic dance in place: shuffling, tapping its feet, and capering. The target has the Incapacitated condition. A dancing creature uses all its movement to dance without leaving its space and has Disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws and attack rolls. At the end of each of its turns, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw to end the effect.

spells.name: Planar Ally
spells.description: You beseech an otherworldly entity for aid. The being must be known to you: a god, a primordial, a demon prince, or some other being of cosmic power. That entity sends a Celestial, an Elemental, or a Fiend loyal to it to aid you. The creature is under no compulsion to behave in any particular way. You must negotiate its services.

spells.name: Primordial Ward
spells.description: You have Resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, and Thunder damage for the spell's duration. When you take damage of one of those types, you can use your Reaction to gain Immunity to that type of damage. If you do so, the Resistances end, and you have the Immunity until the end of your next turn, then the spell ends.

spells.name: Programmed Illusion
spells.material: jade dust worth 25+ GP
spells.description: You create an illusion of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon within range that activates when a specific condition occurs. The illusion is imperceptible until then. It must be no larger than a 30-foot Cube, and you decide the illusion's behavior and sounds when you cast the spell.

spells.name: Scatter
spells.description: The air quivers around up to five creatures of your choice that you can see within range. An unwilling creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw to resist this spell. You teleport each affected target to an unoccupied space that you can see within 120 feet of you.

spells.name: Soul Cage
spells.casting_time: Reaction, when a humanoid you can see within 60 feet dies
spells.material: a tiny silver cage worth 100+ GP
spells.description: This spell snatches the soul of a humanoid as it dies and traps it inside the tiny cage. While you have a soul inside the cage, you can exploit it in any of these ways (up to 6 times total): Steal Life (2d8 HP), Query Soul (information), Borrow Experience (Advantage on one roll), Eyes of the Dead (see through their senses).

spells.name: Summon Fiend
spells.material: humanoid blood in a ruby vial worth 600+ GP
spells.description: You call forth a fiendish spirit. It manifests in an unoccupied space you can see within range. The spirit uses the Fiend Spirit stat block. When you cast this spell, choose Demon, Devil, or Yugoloth. The creature's appearance and abilities depend on your choice.
spells.at_higher_levels: For each slot level above 6th, AC increases by 1, Hit Points increase by 10, and damage increases by 1d8.

spells.name: Sunbeam
spells.material: a magnifying glass
spells.description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long Line. Each creature in the Line makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 6d8 Radiant damage and has the Blinded condition until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't Blinded. On each of your turns, you can create a new Line of radiance as a Magic action.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Tasha's Otherworldly Guise
spells.material: an object engraved with a symbol of the Outer Planes, worth 500+ GP
spells.description: Uttering an incantation, you draw on the magic of the Lower Planes or Upper Planes (your choice) to transform yourself. Choose Lower Planes (Immunity to Fire and Poison, +2 AC, 40-ft fly speed) or Upper Planes (Immunity to Radiant and Necrotic, +2 AC, 40-ft fly speed). You can attack twice when you take the Attack action.

spells.name: Tenser's Transformation
spells.material: a few hairs from a bull
spells.description: You endow yourself with endurance and martial prowess fueled by magic. Until the spell ends, you have: 50 Temporary Hit Points, Advantage on weapon attack rolls, extra 2d12 Force damage when you hit with a weapon, proficiency with all armor/shields/simple/martial weapons, proficiency in Strength and Constitution saves. You can't cast spells during this transformation.

spells.name: Transport via Plants
spells.description: This spell creates a magical link between a Large or larger inanimate plant within range and another plant, at any distance, on the same plane of existence. You must have seen or touched the destination plant at least once before. Any creature can step into the target plant and exit from the destination plant.

spells.name: True Seeing
spells.material: mushroom powder worth 25+ GP, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You give a willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are. For the duration, that creature has Truesight with a range of 120 feet, notices secret doors hidden by magic, and sees into the Ethereal Plane, all within the same range.

spells.name: Wall of Ice
spells.material: a piece of quartz
spells.description: You create a wall of ice on a solid surface within range. You can form it into a hemispherical dome or a sphere with a radius of up to 10 feet, or you can shape a flat surface made up of ten 10-foot-square panels. The wall has AC 12 and 30 Hit Points per 10-foot section, and it has Vulnerability to Fire damage.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 2d6 for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Wall of Thorns
spells.material: a handful of thorns
spells.description: You create a wall of tough, pliable, tangled brush bristling with needle-sharp thorns. The wall can be up to 60 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick, or a circle that has a 20-foot diameter and is up to 20 feet high and 5 feet thick. A creature takes 7d8 Piercing damage when it enters the wall's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.
spells.at_higher_levels: Both types of damage increase by 1d8 for each slot level above 6th.

spells.name: Wind Walk
spells.material: fire and holy water
spells.description: You and up to ten willing creatures within range assume a gaseous form for the duration. While in this cloud form, a creature has a Fly Speed of 300 feet and has Resistance to damage from nonmagical weapons. A creature can revert to its normal form, taking 1 minute to do so.

spells.name: Word of Recall
spells.description: You and up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of you instantly teleport to a previously designated sanctuary. You and any creatures that teleport with you appear in the nearest unoccupied space to the spot you designated when you prepared your sanctuary.
